welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pearl City, a charming gem on the beautiful island of Oahu. With its stunning beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Inter-Island Terminal
terminals.description: The inter-island terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves flights to other islands in Hawaii.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Kaneohe Bay MCAS (Marion E. Carl Field) Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
